titles.title: Tribal Adoption Parity Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to recognize Indian tribal governments for purposes of determining under the adoption credit whether a child has special needs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/23/2015--Introduced. Tribal Adoption Parity Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Indian tribes to make the determination that a child is a child with special needs for purposes of the adoption tax credit.
